Welcome to my technical blog where I share insights, tutorials, and explorations in R programming, data science, and research computing.

1 Explore by Category

  • Programming & Development: R package development, functional programming, object-oriented techniques
  • Data Analysis & Visualization: Data cleaning, visualization techniques, statistical analysis
  • Deployment & Operations: Docker containers, cloud deployment, web hosting
  • Development Environment: Vim/Neovim, terminal tools, Git workflows
  • Shiny Applications: Web applications, interactive dashboards, data collection tools
  • AI & Automation: LLMs, ChatGPT integration, research automation
  • System Administration: Linux, dual-boot configurations, server management ## Introduction
